trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>PUT</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic synchronizes Media Services storage account records with the storage account key.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>PUT</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic synchronizes Media Services storage account records with the storage account key.

trans-unit.source: The new key is returned in the request body.
trans-unit.target: The new key is returned in the request body.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you regenerate the storage account key using portal, you can call this method to get the updated key value.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you regenerate the storage account key using portal, you can call this method to get the updated key value.

trans-unit.source: The request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storageAccount%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the Storage Account name that is associated with the specified Media Services account:
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storageAccount%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the Storage Account name that is associated with the specified Media Services account:

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 204 (NoContent).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 204 (NoContent).

trans-unit.source: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: See the <languageKeyword>SynchronizeStorageAccountKey</languageKeyword> method in <link xlink:href="1b2943bc-a9cb-4373-abbc-ff83ff60c69c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Use Media Services Management REST API</link>.
trans-unit.target: See the <languageKeyword>SynchronizeStorageAccountKey</languageKeyword> method in <link xlink:href="1b2943bc-a9cb-4373-abbc-ff83ff60c69c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Use Media Services Management REST API</link>.
